1.content:
"...remember, darling! We'll be leaving next Monday for our trip to Europe!" said Mrs. Chambers, patting her son's thigh as the enormous, navy blue limousine pulled up outside of Sterlington Private Academy for Boys. "You still haven't told daddy and me who you're going to be bringing with you on our holidays!"

"Mom's right, champ!" said Mr. Chambers, "Don't forget, now!"

"I won't forget, mommy. I'll tell you once I come home from school today!" he said.

The back door to the limousine swung open and Chester waddled out, straining against his enormous school uniform - custom-made to fit his gigantic body - while the family's chauffeur held out his schoolbag for him.

"Thanks, Davis", he said, and waddled off to class. Chester was so fat that he had to waddle around school with a walking-stick, to help him keep his balance. He finally made it to his classroom and sat down at the back. He stared around and wondered who he would pick to accompany him on his month-long luxury cruise to Europe and around the Mediterranean...

There were so many people he could choose! Who would he take with him?

Timmy Jenkins - his poor, but honest friend, who loves feeding Chester all he can eat...and even more!

Tiberius Vanderstaal - His extremely good-looking, rich boy-model friend, who loves teasing Chester about his obesity, and rubbing his fat-rolls!!

Ryan Applewood - his parents run a vegan healthfood company that he can't stand! Maybe a month of junkfood will cheer him up?

Jasper DeJaeger - Hollywood superstar and child-actor extraordinaire - one of Chester's oldest friends, who has a weakness for his friend's massive size.
1.title: Chester Chooses a Chum

choices: ...Sure, I'll come! If my parents say yes".
...I already made plans. Why don't you ask Alvaro?"
...I should ask your parents. Can I come to your house after school?"
Bruno Baxter, the school bully picks on Timmy and Chester defends him!
Timmy says no, but two other friends ask to come on his holiday instead.
11.content:
WHUMP!!

"OW!"

"Huh!?"

CRUNCH!!

"My glasses!"

"Oh shit! S-sorry dude!"

Chester had waddled into school and was heading to his locker when he slammed into something thin and pale, bowling little Timmy Jenkins right off his feet! His spectacles fell to the ground! As Chester struggled to regain his balance, he'd accidentally trodden on them, his 525-pound bulk crushing them to pieces!

"I just got them!" he gasped.

"I'm sorry! I'm sorry!" said Chester quickly. He pulled Timmy to his feet, "Oh man!"

"Dad's gonna kill me!"

Chester knew that Timothy was exaggerating, but not by much - The Jenkins family was one of Sterlington Academy's charity-cases - intelligent, deserving kids who got into the school on a free scholarship paid for by the school board.

Timmy was exceptionally bright, but also a magnet for bullies. He was also one of Chester's closest friends - the fat kid, and the scrawny geek with glasses naturally stuck together.

"I'll get my dad to buy you a new pair!" said Chester, "Sorry dude! Are you OK?"

"I'm fine!" said Timmy, "I have a spare pair in my bag!"

Timmy pulled out his old pair of glasses and carefully fitted them onto his thin, pale face. Like Chester, Timmy had blonde hair, although his was lighter, and his skin was paler, his eyes a frigid icy blue.

"Sorry dude!" said Chester.

"It's okay!" said Timmy, massaging his elbow where he'd fallen over. "Ow, that stings!"

"I'll get my dad to buy you a new pair!" said Chester at once, "Sorry dude!"

"Thanks Ches. You're the best!" said Timmy.

The two boys went to their lockers and Chester shoved his bag inside and pulled out his books.

"Hey Timmy, uh..." he paused. "Um...y'know school holidays start soon and uh, well my parents are going on a trip to Europe...you wouldn't wanna come with me, would you?"

Timmy laughed, "Dude, I can't go to Europe!"

"No, I mean you'd come as my friend! My guest! We'd pay everything for you!"

"I...But Ches that's gotta be like a million bucks! I can't...I mean..."

"Please? It'd be really cool!"

"Well...yeah but...I...really? Me? You have so many other rich friends you could take!"

"Dude, I'm offering because you're my friend, not because of...whatever!"

"Oh...yeah I...Sorry Ches I didn't mean...I mean...I..."
11.title: Timmy Jenkins.

choices: Chester invites Tiberius with him on the trip to Europe
Chester changes his mind and asks his poor friend, Timothy.
Before Chester can answer, his weight breaks the chair underneath him!
Tiberius feeds Chester a bar of chocolate while he makes up his mind.
12.content:
"Hey fatass!"

"Hah!" Chester yelped, when he felt a hand rubbing his cheek and down the back of his neck.

"What's up, huh Tubby?"

Chester twisted around. A flurry of golden hair and blindingly white teeth was his first impression, when a tall, and extremely good-looking boy sat down in the desk next to him.

Tiberius Vanderstaal.

The Vanderstaals were one of those insanely rich, old-money families. Tiberius's grandfather was the CEO of Vanderstaal Apparel, one of the most famous luxury clothing and accessories companies in the world. Tiberius was naturally decked out in the finest clothes that money could buy. He looked just like a model - because he was.

"Hello Tiberius..." Chester groaned, rolling his eyes. His friend laughed.

"What's up Ches?" he asked, "What are you doin' for the holidays? Gonna camp out in your factory and eat all the leftovers, huh fatty?"

"FOR your information, my family is going to EUROPE for the holidays and I WAS asked to pick a FRIEND to come with me", said Chester, "And I WAS thinking of asking YOU. But if that's how you wanna be..."

"Aww! No, c'mon dude! No cool!" Tiberius said, "You're gonna invite me, ain'tcha!?"

"Well I dunno...after all...perhaps I should ask Timmy...he'd like it more..."

"Timmy!? You don't want to invite him! C'mon man..."

"Or..."

"...or if you don't wanna go to Europe with your parents, you could come to my place for a sleepover!"

"For a whole month?"

"Why not!?"

Chester rolled his eyes, "You are IMPOSSIBLE, Tiberius..."

"Impossibly CUTE", he teased, and leaned in to give his friend a kiss on the cheek.

"EEWWW!!"

Tiberius laughed, "So c'mon fatty, what's it gonna be? Either way, you know I'mma be good company..." he teased.
12.title: Tiberius Vanderstaal

info.brief_description: The immensely fat son of billionaire confectionery magnates can have whatever he wants!
info.description:
Born into a life of limitless privilege and immeasurable wealth, Chester Chambers is the richest little boy in the world! Able to have literally anything he wants at the snap of his fingers, Chester lives the kind of pleasured, pampered existence that no other child in the world could even begin to imagine!

Spoiled by his pampering and permissive parents, Chester has always been allowed to have anything he could ever want. This led to his immense greed and gluttony causing staggering levels of obesity and weight-gain, as he gorged himself on junkfood, cakes, sweets, chocolates and candies, all produced by his family's multi-billion-dollar confectionery empire!

Despite his life of unimaginable excess and obscene decadence, although he has never been denied anything in his life, Chester was always reminded by his parents that with immense wealth and privilege, came responsibilities and philanthropy.

A celebrity in his own right, Chester has become as famous for his prince-like charity and generosity, as he has for his immense obesity, monstrous weight-gain, and insatiable gluttony!!

Characters:

Tobias Chambers

The CEO of the Chambers Confectionery Company, which has been family-owned for over 100 years! A wealthy businessman, a loving husband, and doting father, Toby only loves two things in life: Making money, and making his family happy.

Hair:Light brown.
Eyes: Green.
Height: 5'9"
Weight: 350lbs.
Age: 40.

Eldonia Chambers

Mr. Chambers' wife, and Chester's mother, she's the head of marketing and advertising at Chambers Confectionery, and is as sweet and loving a mother as you could ever imagine! She constantly tries to feed her son and make sure that he has more than enough to eat!

Hair: Blonde.
Eyes: Blue.
Height: 5'7"
Weight: 300lbs.
Age: 38.

Chester Chambers

The immensely fat only-son of Mr. and Mrs. Chambers. Although he could have anything in the world that he wants, Chester's biggest desire is for food, and drink! Chester is lazy, gluttonous, greedy, and spoiled, but he's also generous, sweet-natured, friendly, and loves lavish displays of wealth and privilege.

Hair: Blonde.
Eyes: Blue.
Height: 5'4"
Weight: 525lbs.
Age: 10.
